channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists confirm what employees already know: Working from home really does make you happier
item.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella may think that remote work weakens social ties and makes workers less innovative, but the research is in and one thing is ...

item.title: Is There a Market for $10,000 Bespoke Computer Keyboards?
item.description: If you said no, think again. How one company found success in an unexpected niche.

item.title: This laundry-folding robot startup swears it’s for real
item.description: A robot that folds your laundry is the kind of idea that sells itself. Just ask Syncere , a five-person startup that secured more than 1,000 preorders...

item.title: ‘Peak Goldilocks’: The markets have bought the Fed rumors — watch for them to sell on the news
item.description: Markets will move on Wednesday after Wall Street parses Cook’s statement and his Q&A for clues about future rate cuts beyond Wednesday.

item.title: The CEO I needed didn’t exist. So I decided to become her
item.description: For most of my career, I looked around the room and saw male C-suite leaders. This was especially true in healthcare, even across companies that large...

item.title: Why Fourth Power Just Raised a $20 Million Series A Plus
item.description: The firm has proven its thermal batteries can store energy in carbon blocks. It will use this latest round to scale commercial viability.

item.title: Why McDonald’s Is Investing $200 Million in This Regenerative Technology
item.description: Regenerative agricultural techniques can reduce the need for synthetical chemicals and fertilizers.

item.title: Why MrBeast would be making a huge mistake launching his own mobile phone service

item.title: What CEOs think about the SEC ‘prioritizing’ Trump’s plan to end quarterly reporting for public companies
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Larry Ellison is quickly becoming the biggest media magnate in America

item.title: Elon Musk’s $1 Billion Tesla Purchase Comes After an 80 Percent Stock Rally
item.description: Wall Street veteran Jordi Visser says history will not favor those who fade the AI trade.

item.title: Hailey Bieber Built a Billion-Dollar Beauty Brand: Here’s What Every Entrepreneur Can Learn From Her Success
item.description: The secret is to balance momentum with meaning.

item.title: There isn’t an AI bubble—there are three
item.description: Wheneven Sam Altman thinks there is an AI bubble, then there most likely is an AI bubble. But it’s even worse than that. There isn’t just one AI bubbl...

item.title: The first person to get a Neuralink chip in his brain says he met Elon Musk on the day of his surgery: ‘He’s a cool dude’
item.description: The 31-year-old Neuralink brain-computer interface recipient says he and Musk later discussed SpaceX and had an "alien talk."

item.title: Trump is pushing for a ‘big cut’ from the Fed—but he’s already on a losing streak
item.description: Trump failed to oust Fed Governor Lisa Cook and is unlikely to get the steep rate cut he demands, as Powell and the FOMC weigh weaker jobs data.
